title: SignShop商店出问题
txt_content:
没有办法创建商店，创建商店的时候会把牌子砸掉，提示已经创建好了，但是还是不能购买/卖出，一段时间可以，过一会又不可以

2013-09-15 03:17:32 [SEVERE] null
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing command 'signshop' in plugin SignShop v2.7.0
        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:46)
        at org.bukkit.command.SimpleCommandMap.dispatch(SimpleCommandMap.java:189)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_5_R3.CraftServer.dispatchCommand(CraftServer.java:566)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72566_d(NetServerHandler.java:1389)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.chat(NetServerHandler.java:1249)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72481_a(NetServerHandler.java:1175)
        at net.minecraft.network.packet.Packet3Chat.func_73279_a(Packet3Chat.java:60)
        at net.minecraft.network.TcpConnection.func_74428_b(TcpConnection.java:442)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72570_d(NetServerHandler.java:222)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkListenThread.func_71747_b(NetworkListenThread.java:53)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:847)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:320)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:716)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:600)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(SourceFile:573)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.sqlite.NestedDB$CausedSQLException.fillInStackTrace(NestedDB.java:649)
        at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java:250)
        at java.lang.Exception.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.sql.SQLException.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at org.sqlite.NestedDB$CausedSQLException.<init>(NestedDB.java:626)
        at org.sqlite.NestedDB._open(NestedDB.java:63)
        at org.sqlite.DB.open(DB.java:86)
        at org.sqlite.Conn.open(Conn.java:140)
        at org.sqlite.Conn.<init>(Conn.java:57)
        at org.sqlite.JDBC.createConnection(JDBC.java:77)
        at org.sqlite.JDBC.connect(JDBC.java:64)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.blocks.SSDatabase.open(SSDatabase.java:77)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.blocks.SSDatabase.<init>(SSDatabase.java:30)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.player.PlayerMetadata.removeMetakeyLike(PlayerMetadata.java:86)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.player.SignShopPlayer.removeMetaByPrefix(SignShopPlayer.java:346)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.commands.TutorialHandler.handle(TutorialHandler.java:36)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.commands.CommandDispatcher.handle(CommandDispatcher.java:31)
        at org.wargamer2010.signshop.SignShop.onCommand(SignShop.java:198)
        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:44)
        ... 15 more

replies.author: zbd123
replies.txt_content: 和其他冲突，你看看还有没有商店插件
